thread.title: Schools: Newton South boys boot Weston
thread.title_full: Schools: Newton South boys boot Weston | Boston Herald

author: Herald Staff
title: Schools: Newton South boys boot Weston
text:
Alec Szartcicz scored the game-winning goal from 30 yards out off the crossbar, leading Newton South (4-5-1) to a 3-1 win against Weston (2-7) in a Dual County League boys soccer clash yesterday.
Cohasset (7-3-1) scored three goals in the last 20 minutes, two off the foot of Mathias Loft, rallying to beat Carver (4-4-1), 3-0, in the South Shore League.
In ISL play, senior Jerry Ozor had a hat trick as Milton Academy blanked Groton , 7-0. . . . Junior Adama Kaba scored all four goals in a 4-0 victory for St. Sebastian’s (1-1-2) against Governor’s .
Girls soccer
Sophomore Sydney Goodwin notched four goals and an assist as Greater Lawrence (5-5) shut out Presentation of Mary , 5-0, in Commonwealth Athletic Conference action.
Emily Nelson finished with a hat trick as well as an assist, leading Peabody (10-0-0) to a 7-0 shutout of Gloucester in a Northeastern Conference battle.
Senior captain Kaler Diemer scored her first goal of the year, and sophomore goalie Jess Delaney preserved the shutout as Hull (1-5-3, 1-4-2) beat Monomoy for its first win of the season in South Shore League play.
In the Dual County League, Ali Nislick tallied two goals in a 3-1 win for Newton South (9-3) against Weston .
Golf
Despite having to take a shot from the roof of the clubhouse following a shanked tee shot on the final hole, Matt Cornelius recovered to win the hole as Melrose (3-5-1) tied undefeated Belmont , 36-36.
Field hockey
Laura McArdle finished with two goals and an assist as Masconomet (9-0-1) took down Georgetown , 7-0, in a Cape Ann League contest.
Volleyball
Madison Majewski finished with 23 assists, leading Case (10-1, 10-0) to a 3-0 sweep of Wareham in a South Coast Conference showdown.
In the Catholic Central small, junior outside hitter Maddy MacGuire collected 28 service points, 12 aces and nine kills as Marian (8-3) swept St. Joseph’s Prep , 3-0.
Compiled by Brendan Connelly, Matt Feld and Brian Roach.
